amendment.description: To provide for the settlement of the water rights claims of the Fort Belknap Indian Community.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1084 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1084 proposed by Senator Daines to Amendment SA 935. (consideration: CR S3727) To provide for the settlement of the water rights claims of the Fort Belknap Indian Community.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1084 proposed by Senator Daines to Amendment SA 935.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1084 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
